### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0,0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that all furnaces have the necessary ingredients and fuel before attempting to operate them. Check the inventory and supply lines to confirm that the required materials are available.
